body.name: BRCOVAN 2 Pack, Aluminum Alloy Diamond Mount Base with 1'' TPU Ball Features Industry-Standard AMPS Hole Pattern Compatible with RAM Mounts B Size 1 inch Ball Double Socket Arm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 14 mins
features: ▶ The ball mount consists of a B size 1'' TPU ball connected to a diamond plate. The diamond plate features industry-standard AMPS holes pattern. The center-to-center distance between the two mounting holes is 1.912'' (48.6mm)

▶ Main body made of 6061-T6 aluminum alloy material with CNC machining and iii grade hard anodized surface for durability and reliability in the most demanding environments. TPU over-molded ball head, non-slip and wear-resistant.
▶ This 1 inch ball mount base compatible with RAM Mounts & BRCOVAN any B size 1'' ball double socket arms. Work for other devices with 1 inch swivel ball mounting pattern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: Used these to mount an action cam to a track-day motorcycle. Safer than suction or double sided tape. Never worry that it will fall off at speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice high quality ball mounts.
reviews.reviewText: I have been thoroughly impressed with these ball mounts. The clamps are high quality and very durable. I used mine for a fish finder mounted to a 3D-printed mount. The ball is hard and solid aluminum, but with the anti-slip molding, I can clamp it down hard and my fish finder is much sturdier that previously. The aluminum is high quality and provides a strong base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality aluminum mounts
reviews.reviewText: I have several Ram mounts on my boat and needed another location for my phone. After trying out the BRCOVAN 2 Pack, Aluminum Diamond Mount Base with 1'' TPU Ball, I have to say I am quite impressed. The aluminum base is durable, and it also looks and feels great. The mounts appear to be very well made and have held up well so far.Overall, I'm quite pleased with my purchase and would recommend these mounts to anyone looking for a secure and stylish 1” ball mounting solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to expensive RAM Mounts diamond ball bases
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a multiple pairs of BRCOVAN (where do they come up with these names?) ball mount components, including handlebar clamps with 1" balls, aluminum alloy diamond shaped bases with 1" balls, 1/4"-20 male threaded posts with 1" balls, and double socket arms to connect the 1" ball components together.I'm going to talk about all of them in this review because it's a system and many of you are no doubt considering purchasing other components, just as I did. I hope that's more helpful than just writing a line or two about the diamond ball bases that are the subject of this review.If you've ever bought, or even priced out, RAM Mounts brand ball mount components, you know that the price can climb rapidly as you assemble the various parts you need. These BRCOVAN components use the same ball diameter of 1" that is used on the popular "B size" RAM Mounts product line. These are completely compatible with the genuine RAM Mounts B size components.The lock and hold just as well as the RAM Mounts brand products and cost only about half as much on average.These are not a compromise in quality at all. In fact, I think that the quality of the 1/4"-20 ball adapters are even better quality than the RAM Mounts equivalent. The handlebar clamps are beautifully machined and finished aluminum and stainless steel. The wing knobs turns with buttery smoothness due to the precise, high-quality threads and smooth pivot points. The diamond base ball adapters have flawlessly machined and finished aluminum bases. The double socket composite arms are also nicer than the RAM Mounts brand becuase they employ dual springs with one per socket end. RAM Mounts have only a single one, causing the socket at the spring end to let go as you loosen the knob, but requiring that you manually release the other end.I don't have any hesitation in recommending these, and other BRCOVAN ball mount accessories. Everything I've seen so far leaves me extremely impressed and satisfied with their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as the more costly components from the other maker
reviews.reviewText: I've got a fair number of RAM connectors for attaching various bits of gear -- iPads, phones. GoPro cameras, my Canon mirrorless camera, etc. -- to my car, my bicycle, my kayak, and more. And picking up a few sets of these BRCOVAN adaptors is a no-brainer way to expand my kit without breaking the bank.These appear to be just as good as the RAM ones. The ball connectors lock into the RAM arms and clamps just as well as the originals.The next time I need more components, I'll definitely be giving the BRCOVAN system a look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight simple attachment.
reviews.reviewText: This fitting is used with other fittings to create a mount for a camera, phone, or other item. It is made of some kind of plastic and is strong enough for its intended use, which is to be part of a mounting system for a fairly light object like a phone, camera or item of similar weight. They make mounts for tubes like handle bars, so this expands the mounting possibilities to flat surfaces as well. It is a versatile mounting system when you have to be able to adjust for odd angles and placements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another win for BRCOVAN
reviews.reviewText: I have quite a few BRCOVAN mounts now and am blown away by their quality. Everything is just as nice as some mounts I've had that were from big well known brand names. Look no further and save yourself a few bucks!
